${ModID}:CozyCamper.NAME: Cozy Camper
${ModID}:CozyCamper.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, gain [E] equal to the non-zero cost of a ${ModID}:Resupplied card.

${ModID}:BigEarner.NAME: Big Earner
${ModID}:BigEarner.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in hand to increase stslib:Persist by 1 this combat. NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!

${ModID}:Minigun.NAME: Minigun
${ModID}:Minigun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL When you ${ModID}:Resupply with this in hand, increase hits by 1.

${ModID}:MiniSentry.NAME: Mini-Sentry Gun
${ModID}:MiniSentry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL On ${ModID}:Resupply deal !${ModID}:sd! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:InvisibilityWatch.NAME: Invisibility Watch
${ModID}:InvisibilityWatch.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill this turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Flanking.

${ModID}:DirectHit.NAME: Direct Hit
${ModID}:DirectHit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL *Direct *Hits deal double damage this turn.

${ModID}:LooseCannon.NAME: Loose Cannon
${ModID}:LooseCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL On ${ModID}:Resupply reduce cost by 1 [E] this combat.

${ModID}:AmmoBox.NAME: Ammo Box
${ModID}:AmmoBox.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Ammo to your hand.
${ModID}:AmmoBox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Ammo+ to your hand.

${ModID}:Dispenser.NAME: Dispenser
${ModID}:Dispenser.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an *Ammo into your hand.
${ModID}:Dispenser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add an *Ammo into your hand.

${ModID}:Ammo.NAME: Ammo
${ModID}:Ammo.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack in your hand. Give it 2 stslib:Persist or increase stslib:Persist by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Ammo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose an Attack in your hand. Give it 2 stslib:Persist or increase stslib:Persist by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
